mapper.insert: insert into sys_phone_area(phone_num, province_code, cart_type, phone_type, row_update_time, row_create_time) values (#{phone_num}, #{province_code}, #{cart_type}, #{phone_type}, #{row_update_time}, #{row_create_time})
mapper.update: update sys_phone_area set province_code = #{province_code}, cart_type=#{cart_type}, phone_type=#{phone_type} where phone_num = #{phone_num}
mapper.select: select * from sys_phone_area t where t.cart_type = #{name}
select * from sys_phone_area t where t.phone_num = #{phone}
